item.description:
Come out for one of the last games of the currently 1st place Providence Bruins season.

Game is at 4:05, we'll meet at Trinity Brewhouse @ 3PM before hand for drinks and to distribute tickets. We'll head over to the Dunkin Donuts Center at around 3:30. Afterwards perhaps a visit to Haven Brothers (Oldest Diner on Wheels in the US) Diner will be in order to refuel after all the raucous cheering.

UPDATE: Kat pointed out that there is a way we can get reduced price tickets. There is a BOGO deal available for purchasing tickets. I've updated the cost below to reflect that as long as we have an even number of people, the cost is $12.50.

I need solid commitment by April 1 to order tickets. I'm planning to order the 100 level tickets, which cost $25/ticket. If you want me to purchase a ticket for you, send me $12.50 via paypal or in cash if you see me at another event between now and then.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Trinity Brewhouse at 3PM for drinks/food. More info when it gets closer.
item.why: What's better than cheering at the top of your lungs, watching men skate around in pajamas and have fist fights on ice?
item.name: Did somebody mention Hockey?
